title: Understanding Somatic Delusions
text: Somatic delusions are a type of delusion where the individual believes something is wrong with their body. This could involve health concerns, bodily symptoms, or the belief that they have an undiagnosed disease.

title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: When considering somatic delusions, think about how they relate to the individual's perception of their own body and health.

hintAnswer: delusions involving health, bodily symptoms, or undiagnosed disease
